Sweet Features

February 20, 2016

When looking for words to fill these sample posts the traditional thing to turn to is a Lorem Ipsum. An Ipsum is a filler text used to demonstrate the graphic elements of a document or visual presentation. While searching for something different to fill these pages found that you can find all kinds of Ipsum generators. From Cupcakes, TV Shows, Movies, Samuel Jackson (not G rated), even one for Obama quotes. Here are a few of my favorite that I came across. DeLorean Ipsum No, Marty, we've already ... VIEW POST

The Framework

We Build Exclusively for the Genesis Framework
All of our themes, require the Genesis Framework in order to function. If you do not already own the Genesis Framework you can click here to purchase it. The Genesis Framework is a one time purchase and good with any Genesis child theme.
